hero.title: Identity Management
hero.subtitle: Secure, scalable identity and access management solutions. Control who has access to what, when, and from where.

overview.title: Enterprise Identity & Access Management
overview.description: Implement comprehensive IAM solutions that provide secure authentication, authorization, and identity governance across your organization.

items.name: Single Sign-On (SSO)
items.description: One set of credentials for all enterprise applications

items.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
items.description: Add extra security layers with MFA/2FA

items.name: Privileged Access Management
items.description: Control and monitor privileged account access

items.name: Identity Governance
items.description: Automate access reviews and compliance reporting

items.name: Federation & Integration
items.description: Connect identity systems across cloud and on-premises
